import requests

url = "https://warzone-2.p.rapidapi.com/api/papi-client/crm/cod/v2/title/mw/platform/uno/gamer/{user}/matches/wz/start/0/end/0/details?="

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "warzone-2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
